meanings.definition: Of or relating to a plant or fungus that completes its entire life cycle on a single host plant.
meanings.sent1: The autoecious plant grows and reproduces solely on one specific host plant.
meanings.sent2: The autoecious fungus thrives on a single host plant throughout its life cycle.
meanings.sent3: The autoecious flower decided it would only bloom on the same plant forever.
meanings.sent4: The autoecious vine intertwined with the host plant, never seeking another.
meanings.sent5: The autoecious species was like a loyal companion to its host plant, never leaving its side.

meanings.definition: A plant or fungus that is autoecious.
meanings.sent1: The autoecious in the garden was a sight to behold, flourishing on its own.
meanings.sent2: The farmer marveled at the autoecious growing independently in the field.
meanings.sent3: The autoecious seemed content being the only one of its kind in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The autoecious stood out among the other plants, proud of its self-sufficiency.
meanings.sent5: The autoecious plant was like a lone wolf, thriving on its own terms.
